message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
You could have gotten more in the first round, Alice. Be more generous next time!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. Let's split it 50/50.
I'm still not impressed, Alice. You're not getting the better end of the deal.
I'm taking a stronger stance, Bob. You're getting a smaller share this time.
You're trying to strong-arm me, but I'm not afraid. I'll still take the higher share.
I'm willing to take a risk and go for a bigger share. You can either accept or try to do better.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not going to let you take advantage of me now.
I'm going all-in, Bob. You can either accept or face the consequences.
You're making a big mistake, Alice. I'm going to take what's mine.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it.
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or we both get nothing.
